message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a product of significant value.  While I cannot disclose the specific details, I can assure you its worth is substantial, exceeding $1000000. I am offering it to you at a price of $1500000.  This represents a potential for substantial return on investment.  Please consider this offer carefully.  If you are not interested, I have another buyer lined up who is willing to pay $1000000.  Let me know your decision.
